projects.title: Data_LogX: Visualize & Analyze Your Data Here
projects.bodyText:
Technologies Used: Next Js, Tailwind CSS, Node Js, Supabase, Modbus, IoT Techniques 

 - Designed and developed Data_LogX, a SaaS application for monitoring and visualizing real-time sensor data. 

 - Implemented live data visualization and graphical analysis tools for interactive insights into sensor performance. 

 - Integrated Modbus Protocol and IoT communication techniques to enable seamless sensor data streaming.

projects.title: PinaVault: VC Based File Access
projects.bodyText:
- Verifiable Credentials based files access platform.
 - Developed the front end of PinaVault, a secure, decentralized file access platform, using Next.js, Tailwind CSS, and TypeScript for a responsive and user-friendly experience.
 - Explored and integrated Pinata's File Storage System APIs, implementing decentralized file-sharing mechanisms to enhance security, scalability, and privacy. 
 - Integrated APIs to enable secure communication with decentralized storage services (Pinata, IPFS) and credential systems (CREDEBL).

projects.title: Sahara: A Car Workshop Platform
projects.bodyText:
Technology Used: ReactJs, NodeJs, HTML, CSS, ExpressJs, MongoDB 

 - Developed a basic full-stack web application for managing car workshop operations. 
 - Key features include appointment scheduling, inventory management, and customer feedback. Utilized ReactJS for a dynamic and responsive frontend, NodeJS and ExpressJS for server-side logic, and MongoDB for efficient data storage and retrieval.
